content: Thanks for writing this, Mark. I’ve been a big admirer of Meredith Perry and uBeam since I first saw her demo the tech. I’m definitely rooting for you guys. It seems that the press wants uBeam to be realistic and it reminds me of an article I wrote a while back on dealing with skeptics: Don’t Be RealisticI recently shared an idea I had with someone and their immediate response was, “be realistic”.medium.com
